column1: SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE country = 'US'
UPDATE orders SET status = 'shipped' WHERE order_id = 1234
INSERT INTO products (name, price, stock) VALUES ('Laptop', 1200, 10)
SELECT product_id FROM orders WHERE status = 'pending'
UPDATE inventory SET stock = stock - 1 WHERE product_id = 5678

SELECT DISTINCT category FROM products WHERE stock > 0
SELECT order_id FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 42 AND status = 'completed'
DELETE FROM logs WHERE event_type = 'error' AND timestamp < '2023-01-01'
